I've completed a warmup exploration of the codebase. Here's what I found:

## Portfolio Project Overview

This is a **Next.js 15** portfolio website built with:

- **Framework**: Next.js 15.3.2 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4.x
- **UI Components**: shadcn/ui (Radix UI primitives)
- **Content Management**: MDX with next-mdx-remote
- **Package Manager**: pnpm 9.x

### Project Structure

```
/src
├── app/           # Next.js App Router pages
│   ├── layout.tsx # Root layout with fonts, metadata, theme
│   ├── page.tsx   # Homepage (redirects to /about)
│   ├── about/     # About page
│   ├── blog/      # Blog section
│   ├── projects/  # Projects showcase
│   ├── resume/    # Resume page
│   └── api/       # API routes (search)
├── components/    # React components
│   ├── ui/        # shadcn/ui components
│   ├── blog/      # Blog-specific components
│   └── ...        # Header, Footer, ThemeProvider, etc.
├── content/       # MDX content files
├── lib/           # Utilities and helpers
└── hooks/         # Custom React hooks
```

### Key Features

- Dark/light theme support via next-themes
- MDX-based blog and project content
- Search functionality with API endpoint
- Responsive design with mobile navigation
- SEO optimized with OpenGraph and Twitter cards

### Documentation

The `/docs` directory contains extensive documentation including:
- Architecture overview
- Sprint planning and workflows
- CLI guide
- Deployment and maintenance guides

---

### Critical Files for Implementation

- **/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/layout.tsx** - Root layout defining global structure, fonts, metadata, and providers
- **/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/page.tsx** - Homepage entry point
- **/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/package.json** - Dependencies and scripts configuration
- **/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/components/ui/** - shadcn/ui component library for consistent UI patterns
- **/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/docs/README.md** - Documentation hub for understanding project conventions
